name: Atomic Goat
description: Atomic Goat is a Seattle-born staple that came about in 2010 when a Chernobyl male pollinated a Golden Goat clone. This hybrid offspring inherits a sweet herbal aroma likened to that of sage as well as a heavy coat of crystal trichomes that often push Atomic Goat past the 20% THC mark. Although Atomic Goat induces deep relaxation of the mind and body, it allows enough energy to shine through to justify its daytime use.
attributes_title: Uplifted, Energetic, Happy, Relaxed, Euphoric, Stress, Pain, Depression, Headaches, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes
